metadata.Title: CVE-2019-15162 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: rpcapd/daemon.c in libpcap before 1.9.1 on non-Windows platforms provides details about why authentication failed, which might make it easier for attackers to enumerate valid usernames.

notes.Note: sbeattie> issue is in the libpcap daemon, introduced in 1.9.0 and is not included in debian/ubuntu packaging

criterions.comment: libpcap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
